name: filtering
title: post filtering
description: control what posts you see on your dashboard

ownPosts.name: hide your own posts
ownPosts.tooltip: hide your own posts on the dashboard

hideShares.name: hide shares toggle
hideShares.tooltip: adds a toggle on home feed to hide shares of accounts you don't follow. by @wowperfect

duplicatePosts.name: hide duplicate posts
duplicatePosts.tooltip: hide duplicate posts on the dashboard

options.name: hide additional shares of the same root post

filterText.name: filtered content
filterText.placeholder: comma-separated list of terms. case-insensitive, partial matches are supported.

filterTags.name: filtered tags
filterTags.placeholder: comma-separated list of tags. case-insensitive, partial matches are supported.

filterCws.name: filtered content warnings
filterCws.tooltip: hide posts containing specified content warnings
filterCws.placeholder: comma-separated list of cws. case-insensitive, partial matches are supported.
